General.Name: Suzhou New District Hi Tech Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou New District Hi-Tech Industrial Co.,Ltd engages in the real estate, energy conservation and environmental protection, strategic emerging industries, non-bank finance and industrial investment business in China. The company offers residential and commercial development, urban service agency construction, and industrial new city operations; and development of culture, business, and tourism. It also provides equipment manufacturing and testing services for mechanical environment and reliability testing which are used in aerospace, aviation, ships, rail transit, automobiles, electronics, and other fields; financial leasing, water supply, amusement, and agency construction services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
General.Address: Jinfeng International Business Building, Suzhou, China, 215163
